row._tooltip: Inserts a non-printing timesignature to indicate a cadenza follows. Each Denemo "bar" should be given enough of the cadenza to make the display easy to read - the Denemo barlines will be ignored. You must insert any barlines and beaming you require (otherwise none will typeset). End the cadenza by inserting an End Cadenza Time in a new Denemo bar. Note all other staffs must have non-spacing rests exactly totalling the literal written duration of the cadenza; do not leave empty Denemo "bars" in those staffs, put in the same duration of non-printing rests as the cadenza has of music.
